2 Greg Parham II

Position Guard

Class Graduate Student

Hometown Richmond, Va.

Highschool Monacan HS

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2021-22: Medically redshirted.

2020-21 (at VMI): Scored over 1,000 points at VMI during his career … Led team in scoring at 18.4 points per game … Added 101 assists and 27 steals … Shot 48.4 percent from the floor and 43.5 percent from three-point range … Named first-team all-SoCon by the media and second-team all-league by SoCon head coaches … Posted 10-plus points in 22 of 25 games … Surpassed 20 points on 12 occasions … Scored 20-plus points in seven straight league contests in January.

2019-20 (at VMI): Averaged 9.4 points and 2.6 rebounds per game … Second on the team with 90 assists … Had a 36-point performance in a road win over Citadel.

2018-19 (at VMI): Averaged 7.1 points and 2.3 rebounds per game … Added 81 assists and 29 steals.

2017-18 (at VMI): Recorded 3.1 points and 1.1 rebounds per game … Added 38 assists and 14 steals.

High School: Selected Player of the Year by the Virginia High School League Coaches Association in 2015-16 … Led Monacan High to the 4A Tournament championship … Named first-team all-state twice … Selected Richmond Times-Dispatch’s Region Player of the Year as a senior … Finished career ranked third on the VHSL’s all-time assists list.

Major: Coaching Certificate

Personal: Full name is Gregory Alden Parham II … Born on January 8, 1999 in Richmond, Va. … Son of Gregory and Nikco Parham … Has one older sister, Gabrielle … Favorite athletes are Allen Iverson and Shai Gilgeous-Alexander … Favorite movies is “Norbit” … Favorite book is Mamba Mentality: How I Play … Favorite music artists are Phora, Yung Bleu and Future … President of SAAC (Student-Athlete Advisory Committee) … Member of Omega Psi Phi.
